abstract: Zurich, one of the largest insurers in Europe, would expand its portfolio in the United States with the acquisition of Rural Community Insurance Services.
snippet: Zurich, one of the largest insurers in Europe, would expand its portfolio in the United States with the acquisition of Rural Community Insurance Services.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Zurich Insurance Group said on Friday that it had agreed to pay as much as $1.05 billion to buy the United States agricultural insurer known as Rural Community Insurance Services from Wells Fargo.

headline.main: Zurich Insurance to Pay Up to $1.05 Billion for Crop Insurer
